entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 12:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NNW 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
